table.name: vtiger_vseven
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_vseven` (`vsevenid` int(11) NOT NULL, `vsevenno` varchar(100) default NULL, `vseven_tks_testname` varchar(10) default NULL , PRIMARY KEY (`vsevenid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vtiger_vsevencf
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_vsevencf` (`vsevenid` int(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`vsevenid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vtiger_vseven_user_field
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_vseven_user_field` (`recordid` int(25) NOT NULL, `userid` int(25) NOT NULL, `starred` varchar(100) default NULL , KEY (`vtiger_vseven_user_field`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
